extendedInfo.description: Bank on the go with access to your Columbia Bank accounts through your mobile device. Columbia Bankâs Free Personal Mobile Banking allows you to conveniently manage your finances at any time from virtually any location.Features*  View balances and transaction history*  Transfer money between your Columbia Bank accounts*  Search for nearby branches and ATMsSecuring Your Information*  Personal Mobile Banking employs a variety of security features to protect your information.  Visit columbiabank.com to view our Personal Online Terms and Conditions to learn more about the ways we protect your information.* Your mobile carrierâs text messaging and web access charges may apply.

reviews.title: Unable to get logged in
reviews.comment: Had to reset phone. I tried twice calling and have them reset security questions. Still asks same dont let me setup new answers.
reviews.author: Michael Frovarp

reviews.title: Works about half the time
reviews.comment: This app works great when it does. Crashes on startup quite a bit and fails to recognize the user as trusted. Also why does this app need picture and video permissions? You cant photo scan checks with CB
reviews.author: James Davis

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: In the past this app has been amazing. Very convenient. Now that I updated it will no longer work with my phone which is only a year old. Fail.
reviews.author: Bethany Strivens

reviews.title: Big brother\'s watching...
reviews.comment: I refuse to update this app based on its need to access my camera at anytime to take video and pictures. Why is that a needed for me to check my account balance? We\'re under enough surveilance as is. No thanks.
reviews.author: Aliesha Larson

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Moto atrix.  Works great. View balances, transfer funds, pay bills. Quick easy way to manage accounts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just say no....
reviews.comment: Love the convenience of the app, but new accesses go TOO far....uninstalled !!!!!  Question, why hasn\'t CB responded to these concerns??
reviews.author: Rich Orr

reviews.title: Nice and simple
reviews.comment: My only complaint is its lack of ability to auto rotate and print....
reviews.author: David Bolling

reviews.title: Why??
reviews.comment: I refuse to update this app. Why does it need access to my call log and contact list?? App works just fine as it is. Bad form Columbia Bank bad form.
reviews.author: Mark Miller

reviews.title: Absurd.
reviews.comment: I have refused the update and until today was still able to login successfully.   Now I can\'t without updating first.   Used to be a four star app. Now I will withhold such rating until the previous version is restored.
reviews.author: Sky Tilton

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: Up until about a week ago was working great, but now all I get is a kick back to my main screen upon loading the login screen... Fix the issues and a 5star will be in the works.
reviews.author: Ross Rifenberick

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Simple but shows everything I\'ll ever need. Online account transfers are fast and efficient. Excellent app!
reviews.author: James McFarland

reviews.title: Seriously?
reviews.comment: Every time I go to check my accounts at night there\'s always some sort of error. Then it tells me to call customer service...why should I have to call cause you guys can\'t figure out how to program an app?? So much for convenience!
reviews.author: Steve Olson

reviews.title: owner
reviews.comment: wonderful people to deal with.
reviews.author: Marylou Witter

reviews.title: No
reviews.comment: Would give it more, but everytime(and I mean EVERYTIME) I go to use this there is some sort of error.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Major problems
reviews.comment: Hasn\'t worked for last week!!! 3 stars for it working sometimes.
reviews.author: Tiffany Rousser

reviews.title: Needed info
reviews.comment: Should have mentioned that you have to set all up online before mobile app will work. But once all is set up....works like a charm ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bummer
reviews.comment: \"Unable to validate account information\" would have been great if it worked
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: FINALLY! Love the app :) works perfectly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mike
reviews.comment: I will not update it because of  the new camera features... Big brother watches us enough.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: CB App
reviews.comment: The app is great! I am so excited that the bank finally got a mobile banking app!!
reviews.author: A Google User
